review: I am diagnosed with tumor treatment relates L1 & L3 sarcoma(cancer)and gone through major surgery( cancer )at Manipal hospital ,HAL road,Bengaluru. Overall it has been a comforting experience for us. Dr.Srimanth and his supporting staffs are very supportive and helped lot throughout the hospital visit and during the hospitalization. Thanks to Dr.Srimanth his support , encouragement and good treatmen
